name: Black Friday Beatdown!
description:
After missing his daughter's thanksgiving day play at school, Charlie sets out on a quest to make things right by obtaining the perfect Christmas gift, a limited edition teddy bear! Using the martial arts skills he learned in his youth, he'll let nothing, not even a horde of Black Friday shoppers, stand in his way! But will that be enough to claim his prize? 

A game made by Andrew Reilly
